section.heading: Events causing dissolution.
section.text: A statutory trust shall be dissolved only by:

para.text: An administrative dissolution under §§ 29-106.01 and 29-106.02; or
The filing of articles of dissolution under § 29-1208.02:
As provided in the certificate of trust; or
With the approval of all the beneficial owners.

annotations.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 substituted “’As provided in the certificate of trust” for “On the occurrence of an event or circumstance that the governing instrument states causes dissolution” in (2)(A).
annotations.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 801 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act.
Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
